description: Allows the player to create a seismic wave knocking back and damaging all entities within range.

duration.description: Specifies the duration of the ability in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks).

damage.description: Specifies the damage that is dealt to the entities.

name.description: Specifies the name of the ability.

range.description: Specifies the range of the ability.

particle.description: Specifies the particle used to create visual effects.

speed.description: Specifies the speed at which to knock back the entities.

height.description: Specifies the height to which to knock back the entities.
